overview: Laurent Martenot is a salesman and business entrepreneur at heart. As an MBA graduate and international affairs specialist based in Paris, France, Laurent has traveled around the world to sell technical solutions to public and private corporations. In 2001, he founded the company Eldesem, a provider of engineering solutions to the Mexican food industry. In 2007, along with his activities as the CEO of Eldesem and through self-funding, he set up a team of technical partners to tackle the web market. In 2009, Laurent founded 50I50 Inc. in California, a non-profit corporation to promote 50I50’s time-space technology and democracy business model. Laurent now lives in Los Gatos, California.
